mapper.select: select e.employeeName,s.* from salaryInfo s inner join employee e on s.employeeID = e.employeeID and s.employeeID=#{employeeID} and month=#{yearMonth}
mapper.update: update ems.salaryinfo set password = #{password} where employeeID=#{employeeID}
mapper.select: select COLUMN_NAME columnName, COLUMN_COMMENT comment from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS Where table_name = 'employee' AND table_schema = 'ems' AND column_Name like "employeeName" union all select COLUMN_NAME columnName, COLUMN_COMMENT comment from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS Where table_name = 'salaryInfo' AND table_schema = 'ems';
